name: Dreamjob: Kid's Doctor
description:
Jump into the role of a kid's doctor and treat the little aches and pains of your patients. While doing this you'll learn a lot worth knowing about bodies, children's illnesses, health and nutrition.

Your own doctor's practice for kids
Starting on the very first day lots of little patients need your help. Ask the children the appropriate questions in order to find out exactly what they need. Do they have measles, a cough or some other illness? Babies of course can't speak yet, but the mother is there to help. Afterwards you can carefully and skillfully examine and treat the little ones: listen to the lungs, disinfect wounds, administer x-rays, apply bandages, administer blood tests, vaccinate and much more.

Upgrade your practice
Of course you have to make sure that enough money is earned. With the income you earn you can upgrade your waiting room so that your patients feel comfortable at your practice. Additionally, it is important that you purchase new medical devices so that you can administer treatments and continually make sure that you have everything you need. You can even hire an assistant. Then you're ready for even the biggest rush of patients!
